title: 《Minecraft: 故事模式》第二章将于本周提供下载
author: minehenry
txt_content:
本帖最后由 minehenry 于 2015-10-27 21:30 编辑 



.@Minecraft: #StoryMode Out Now at Retail w/ Ep 2 Ready for Download THIS WEEK!
Info: https://t.co/y9zLonU0gR
Watch: https://t.co/Sza8JyQw9z

故事模式现在已经可以以零售的形式贩卖了，Ep2(第二章)这周就可以准备下载了!


更多信息：https://t.co/y9zLonU0gR
Along with the worldwide release of Minecraft: Story Mode at retail, we have another amazing bit of news: Episode Two - ‘Assembly Required’ will be available to download THIS WEEK! 

随着故事模式在全球发布零售版，我们还有另一个更惊人的消息：故事模式第二章"集结号"将会在本周提供下载地址！

预告片：https://t.co/Sza8JyQw9z
